text: Kai Ephron is an American and British film director. He is best known for his work on the feature film Benjamin Troubles. ==Career== Kai started his career as a lead actor in Flesh Suitcase (1995) and worked as a location manager in Eagle Eye, Inception, Super 8 and many more. His debut feature film Benjamin Troubles had been screened in Santa Fe Film Festival and Sedona Film Festival. ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Film !Director !Producer !Notes |- |- | 2015 | Benjamin Troubles | style="text- align:center;"| | style="text-align:center;"| | Feature Film |- | 1995 | Flesh Suitcase | style="text-align:center;"| | style="text-align:center;"| | Feature Film |- | 1993 | Sexual Intent | style="text-align:center;"| | style="text- align:center;"| | Feature Film |- |- |} ==References== == External links == * * Category:Living people Category:American film directors Category:1965 births
title: Kai Ephron
